chat.placeholder: What is your next Code Idea?

feature.title: The AI programming genius that helps you coding faster, easier, and more efficient.
feature.subtitle: Writing great code can be a challenging and time-consuming task, but with Code Genius you can take your skills to the next level! Explore the possibilities!

superHero.title: Create Genius Code
superHero.subtitle: Take your code ideas to the next level with the power of AI.

smart.title: Boost your code performance with AI
smart.subtitle: Code Genius analyzes your code in real-time, offering smart suggestions and code improvements. From enhancing syntax to optimizing algorithms, Code Genius ensures your code is clean, efficient, and error-free.

test.title: Generate unit tests in seconds
test.subtitle: Writing unit tests can be a tedious and time-consuming task. With Code Genius you can automatically generate test cases that cover a wide range of scenarios, ensuring that your code is thoroughly tested and reliable.

docs.title: Create code documentation faster
docs.subtitle: Good documentation is key to writing maintainable code. With Code Genius, you can automatically generate clear and concise documentation for your code.
